overview:
A social technology firm focusing in the social, mobile and cloud space

Kuliza is a social technology firm helping companies leverage technology support in the space of social software, community platforms, mobile apps and cloud computing. Kuliza provides an end-to-end support in planning, designing, developing these social products and manage their infrastructure on cloud.

Kuliza provides the following offerings: ZaSocial: For conceptualizing, designing and developing online communities, facebook apps, social CRM tools and Social Commerce platforms.

ZaMobile: For conceptualizing, designing and developing mobile apps for smartphones

ZaCloud: For helping companies get a hassle free infrastructure

In all the above offerings, Kuliza provides both solutions - which are Kuliza researched and developed frameworks, as well as services - where Kuliza works with companies to build social or mobile software from scratch.

For more info see Kuliza’s company profile at http://www.slideshare.net/Kuliza_Research/kuliza-corporate-profile-feb2011v3
